headline: Edison International (EIX) Target Trimmed as Morgan Stanley Flags Ongoing Wildfire Exposure
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) is included among the 13 Best January Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On December 17, Morgan Stanley analyst David Arcaro lowered the firm’s price target on Edison International (NYSE:EIX) to $57 from $59 and kept an Underweight rating on the stock. The change came as part of a broader update to price […]
